name: All Ways Mort
description:
Lore

Haven't you read the sign before accessing to this page ? No sign, Which sign ?! The one who tell you do not come here !

Unfortunately it's too late, before you realize it, you reached a parallal dimension where you are a warrior of the Coliseum or more probably an alien arena.

After less than 10 sec you died ... End of the story.

Oh what ? You revive as a ghost with some powers ?! You don't know how it's possible, but you got a strangely crystal which one revive you each time you pass away.

To earn your liberty, you only need to perform 1 things : defeat all the ennemies before they destroy your life crystal. There is no others ways to claim your liberty and life !

Controls

You can play this game with a mouse and a keyboard, or with a controller.

ActionMouse / KeyboardController (XBox)Move your characterW, A, S, DLeft StickShoot fireballsERight TriggerAim of your fireballs, choose new tower locationMouse CursorRight StickAdd a tower when possibleSpace barA
*Only in exe Project information

This game has been made during the november 2022 UPsi Jam 2 in the span of 42h.

The theme was "Allways more". Our intepretation is an endless fight versus more and more enemys, where the character must survive the most of possible time. In addition of this, we did a word game with "all ways mort" (mort in french means dead), where the character will as finality die whatever the ways he did.

All images were hand-made especially during the Jam.

To achieve this game, we used Unity.
